name: PaymentCardReader.Token
desc: A secure token that you receive from your participating payment service provider.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a token with the string your payment service provider gave you.

items.name: let rawValue: String
items.desc: The raw token string from your payment service provider.

items.name: typealias RawValue
items.desc: The raw type that can be used to represent all values of the conforming type.
